item.title: Smoke tool tutorial [01]: GAM manual - Data collection
item.description:
This tutorial is for the “PM2.5 and O3 smoke tool” app, available at (https://westar.shinyapps.io/PMO3smokeTool/).

The [GAM manual] tab is designed to provide users with comprehensive tools to manually manage data collection and loading processes for building GAMs. It includes two main sub-tabs: [Data collection] and [Load dataset]. In this post, we introduce how to use [Data collection] sub-tab in [GAM manual] tab.

  1. Go to [GAM manual] > [Data collection] tab.
